data.name: ReadAlert1
data.value: select top(1) CONTROL_NUMBER, NAME, MESSAGE, DESCRIPTION, EXTERNAL_INDICATOR from CKT_ALERT where CONTROL_NUMBER = @controlNumber

data.name: ReadAlert2
data.value: select top(1) CONTROL_NUMBER, NAME, MESSAGE, DESCRIPTION, EXTERNAL_INDICATOR from CKT_ALERT where NAME = @name

data.name: ReadAlert3
data.value: select top(1) CONTROL_NUMBER, NAME, MESSAGE, DESCRIPTION, EXTERNAL_INDICATOR from CKT_ALERT where NAME = @name

data.name: ReadAlertDistributionRule
data.value: select top(1) SYSTEM_GENERATED_I, EVE_NO, EVD_ID, ALE_NO from CKT_ALERT_DST_RULE where ALE_NO = @aleNo
